item.title: ChatGPT, D&D and Greek/Roman deities
item.description: So I’ve asked ChatGPT to write comment on the stats and alignment of each Greek/Roman deities, results below. Not bad, though I would have done it very differently. Zeus/Jupiter (King of the Gods): Primary Stat: Charisma (CHA) Secondary Stat: Strength (STR) Alignment: Lawful Good Justification: Zeus is often portrayed as a just ruler, upholding laws and order on Mount Olympus. While he is not without flaws, his role as the king of the gods aligns with a lawful approach to governance.
